trans-unit.source: Represents a single view of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control.
For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> class.
The model data source that owns this view.
The owner parameter is `null`.
Occurs when data methods are being called.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports the delete operation.
Returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> property has a value.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports the insert operation.
Returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A> property has a value.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through the retrieved data.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to the set of data.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view on the underlying data source.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSource"></xref> control supports the update operation.
Returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.UpdateMethod%2A> property has a value.
`true` if the operation is supported; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the result of a Select operation after converting it to an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> collection if it is not already one.
The result of a Select operation.
The result of a Select operation, converted to an <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable"></xref> collection if it was not originally one.
The return value is not the correct type.

Gets the first item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames"></xref> array of the data-bound control if the data-bound control is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.

The first item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames"></xref> array of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control, or an empty string for other data-bound controls.
Deletes a method and gets the result.
The keys.
The old values.
The callback.
Gets or sets the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object invokes to delete data.
A string that represents the name of the method or that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> uses to delete data.
Invokes the Delete method and gets the result.
The keys.
The old values.
The result of the delete method.
Invokes the insert method.
The values.
The result of the insert method.
Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, and the control values.

This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateMethodParameters%28System.Web.UI.DataSourceOperation%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod%2CSystem.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload with the `isPageLoadComplete` parameter set to `false`.
The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.
The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.
The values from the data-bound control.

Evaluates the method parameters for model binding, using the data source operation, the data source method object, the control values, and a value that indicates whether this method is called in the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event handler.
The data source operation for which the parameters are being evaluated.
The method object for which the parameters are being evaluated.
The values from the data-bound control.

Set to `true` if this method is called in the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete"></xref> event handler, and if it is called to evaluate the select method parameters, and if custom value providers are being used.
This makes it possible to identify changes in the custom value providers in order to mark the data-bound control for data binding if necessary.
Evaluates the select method parameters and also determines the options for processing the select result, such as auto paging and sorting behavior.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> for the select operation.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"></xref> to use for processing the select result once the select operation is complete.

These options are determined in this method and later used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.ProcessSelectMethodResult(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions,System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataMethodResult)"></xref> method.
The information required to invoke the select method.
Invokes the Update method and gets the result.
The keys.
The values.
The old values.
The result of the update method.
Performs a delete operation using the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.DeleteMethod"></xref> method.
The parameters to be used with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.DeleteMethod"></xref> method.
If there are no parameters associated with the method, pass `null`.
The values of the row to be deleted.
The number of rows deleted; otherwise, -1, if the number is not known.
Performs an insert operation using the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.InsertMethod"></xref> method.
The values to be inserted.
The number of rows inserted; otherwise, -1, if the number is not known.
Performs a select operation using the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.SelectMethod"></xref> method.
The select operation arguments.
The result of the select operation.
Performs an update operation using the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.UpdateMethod"></xref> method.
The parameters to be used with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.UpdateMethod"></xref> method.
If there are no parameters associated with the method, pass `null`.
The new values of the row to be updated.
The old values of the row to be updated.
The number of rows inserted; otherwise, -1, if the number is not known.
Finds the method to be executed.
The name of the method to be executed.

A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod"></xref> object with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.Instance"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.MethodInfo"></xref> properties set.

The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod.Parameters"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceMethod"></xref> object is still empty when this method returns.

The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CallingDataMethodsEventArgs.DataMethodsObject"></xref> property and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CallingDataMethodsEventArgs.DataMethodsType"></xref> property both have values, or the specified method was not found.
Invokes the delete method and gets the result.
The parameters to be used with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.DeleteMethod"></xref> method.
If there are no parameters associated with the method, pass `null`.
The values of the row to be deleted.
The result of the delete method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.CanDelete"></xref> property is `false`.
Invokes the insert method and gets the result.
The values to be inserted.
The result of the insert method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.CanInsert"></xref> property is `false`.
Invokes the select method and gets the result.
The select method arguments.
The result of the select method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.SelectMethod"></xref> property is an empty string.
Invokes the update method and gets the result.
The parameters to be used with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.UpdateMethod"></xref> method.
If there are no parameters associated with the method, pass `null`.
The new values of the row to be updated.
The old values of the row to be updated.
The result of the update method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.CanUpdate"></xref> property is `false`.
Inserts a method and gets the result.
The values to be inserted.
The callback.
Gets or sets the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object invokes to insert data.
A string that represents the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> uses to insert data.
Invokes a data method.
An object that provides information about the method to be invoked.
The result of the data method.
Returns a value that indicates whether the control stores state in view state.
`true` if the control stores state in view state; otherwise, `false`.
Restores previously saved view state for the data source view.
The saved view state.
Gets the data type name for the data bound control.
The data type name for the data bound control.
Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.CallingDataMethods"></xref> event.
For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
The data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.CallingDataMethods"></xref> event.
Performs operations on the select method result like auto paging and sorting if applicable.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object for the select operation.

The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions"></xref> object to use for processing the select result.These options are determined in an earlier call to <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.EvaluateSelectMethodParameters(System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataSourceSelectResultProcessingOptions@)"></xref>.
The result after operations like auto paging/sorting are done.
The select method result.
Saves the changes to the view state for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object since the time when the page was posted back to the server.
The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> view state; otherwise `null` if there is no view state associated with the object.
Selects the method and gets the result.
The select method arguments.
The callback selected.
Gets or sets the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> control invokes to retrieve data.
A string that represents the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> uses to retrieve data.

Causes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object to track changes to its view state so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState"></xref> object for the control and persisted across requests for the same page.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> method is primarily used by control developers.
Updates the specified methods using the values provided in the parameters.
The specified keys.
The values to be updated.
The old values to be updated.
The callback.
Gets or sets the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> object invokes to update data.
A string that represents the name of the method that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> uses to update data.
Updates the specified properties using the values provided in the parameters.
The model type name.
The select method name.
The update method name.
The update method name.
The delete method name.
The data key name.
Gets a value indicating whether a server control is tracking its view state changes.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance is cast to the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
`true`, if the data source view is marked saves its state; otherwise, `false`.
Loads the server control’s previously saved view state to the control.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The saved state to restore.
Saves the changes to a server control’s view state to an Object.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
The object that contains the changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView"></xref> view state; otherwise, `null`.
Instructs the server control to track changes to its view state.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ModelDataSourceView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
